title: Ford 8N Tractor and Implements | Building A Homestead In 7 Days

subtasks: Drive the tractor and use its transmission
Inspect and replace parts of the tractor
Install safety features such as battery disconnect
Perform repairs and maintenance on the tractor (e.g., replacing head gasket)
Connect and adjust implements to the tractor
Use various farming implements (e.g., disc harrow, plow, back blade)

tasks.task: Participate in winter activities (e.g., plowing snow)

subtasks: Clear driveways of snow and debris
Restore and maintain old farming equipment (e.g., disc harrow, plow)
Use farm equipment to demonstrate tasks and skills
